feed.title: GitHub SystemVerilog Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of SystemVerilog in GitHub

entry.title: WangXuan95/FPGA-USB-Device
entry.summary: An FPGA-based USB 1.1 device core to implement USB-camera, USB-audio, USB-disk, USB-keyboard, USB-serial, etc. It requires 3 common IOs instead of additional chips. 基于FPGA的USB1.1 device端控制器，可实现USB摄像头、USB音频、U盘、USB键盘、USB串口等设备，只需要3个FPGA普通IO，而不需要额外的接口芯片。
